text: Sophie Turner and Maisie Williams are keeping Ned Stark ’ s ( Sean Bean ) legacy alive, one “ Lion King ” song at a time. In an extended preview clip from Apple Music ’ s next “ Carpool Karaoke ” episode, the two “ Game of Thrones ” actresses drive around town reading song lyrics from “ Hakuna Matata ” and Sir Mix - a - Lot ’ s “ Baby Got Back ” in the very serious voice of the former Hand of the King. The game certainly cracked them up, at least — watch the video above. And no, it doesn ’ t contain any spoilers from Sunday ’ s Season 7 finale.
